name: UpdateBoardClassification
description:
Update board classification for team boards in Miro.

This tool updates the classification for either non-classified or all boards within a specified team in an Enterprise Miro account. It requires the user to have Company Admin privileges and the required scope of 'boards:write'. Ideal for Enterprise plan users needing to organize board classifications efficiently.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization. Required for specifying which organization's team boards will be classified.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team whose board classification is being updated. This is used to specify which team's boards will be affected by the API call.

parameters.name: data_classification_label_id
parameters.description: The ID of the data classification label to assign to a team's boards.

value_schema.description: Data classification label id for team

parameters.name: assign_to_not_classified_only
parameters.description: If true, assign data classification only to non-classified boards; otherwise, assign to all boards.

value_schema.description: Assign data classification label to not-classified only or to all boards of team

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: labelId
parameters.description: Data classification label id for team

value_schema.description: Data classification label id for team

parameters.name: notClassifiedOnly
parameters.description: Assign data classification label to not-classified only or to all boards of team

value_schema.description: Assign data classification label to not-classified only or to all boards of team
